gw.testharness.clustering

Class ClusterTestEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.test.TestEnvironment
      • gw.testharness.v3.PLTestEnvironment
        • gw.testharness.clustering.ClusterTestEnvironment

  • public class ClusterTestEnvironment
extends PLTestEnvironment
    Test environment for automated clustering tests. Starts H2 in-memory database in server mode, starts additional servers by cloning current environment. User: akorostov Date: 3/5/12
